name: PIE MAN
description:
To move the Pie Man, use the following keys on your keyboard:

W    up

A      left

S      down

D     right

"What's PIE MAN", you ask.  "Don't you mean PAC MAN?"  No.  PIE MAN is about someone claiming to be "your friend, 29 year veteran of the comic book industry, world's most charming, disarming, elegant, eloquent, and yet, humble man, and trusted member of the media", but is actually an evil internet troll who neglects his Peleton, sings filthy songs, and has an unhealthy and off putting obsession with...pies.

   He will eat as many pies as he can, and also devour his enemies whenever possible.

   Can this manace be stopped??

   Play the game to find out...
